welcome_message_body: Welcome to St. Albert, Canada! Get ready to explore our charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts community, and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that St. Albert has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Namao Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Namao Field Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal for Edmonton International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal is a smaller terminal used for charter and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
